name: A
description: A bright vowel produced with the mouth wide open and tongue forward.

name: Ya
description: A diphthong starting with a glide [j] followed by 'a'.

name: Eo
description: A mid-low vowel produced with the tongue back and mouth partly open.

name: Yeo
description: A diphthong starting with a glide [j] followed by 'eo'.

name: O
description: A rounded vowel produced with lips circled and tongue back.

name: Yo
description: A diphthong starting with a glide [j] followed by 'o'.

name: U
description: A high rounded vowel produced with lips pushed forward.

name: Yu
description: A diphthong starting with a glide [j] followed by 'u'.

name: Eu
description: A high flat vowel produced with the mouth almost closed and tongue central.

name: I
description: A high front vowel produced with the mouth almost closed.

name: Ae
description: A low front vowel produced with the mouth wide open.

name: Yae
description: A diphthong starting with a glide [j] followed by 'ae'.

name: E
description: A mid-high front vowel produced with the mouth slightly open.

name: Ye
description: A diphthong starting with a glide [j] followed by 'e'.

name: Wa
description: A diphthong combining [w] glide and 'a'.

name: Wae
description: A diphthong combining [w] glide and 'ae'.

name: Oe
description: A diphthong usually pronounced like 'we' ([w] + 'e').

name: Weo
description: A diphthong combining [w] glide and 'eo'.

name: We
description: A diphthong combining [w] glide and 'e'.

name: Wi
description: A diphthong combining [w] glide and 'i'.

name: Ui
description: A diphthong combining 'eu' and 'i'.
